name: Simple Endless Space Runner
description:
This is my Simple Endless Space Runner that i created for a project i needed to make. With the help of some tutorials and assets i used. You are a spaceship in the middle of space and you have to dodge the enemies that spawn and try to survive as long as you can with out dying.

Please tell me your feedback about the game i made, i'm quite new to making games and using Itch.io overall, so any criticism is appreciated.

Controls:

  • Up & Down arrow keys to Move.
  • R to Restart after death.
  • P to Main Menu after death.

Assets from: 

Ansimuz (https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/characters/warped-space-shooter-181590)

Tiny Worlds (https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/fonts/free-pixel-font-thaleah-140059)
